explains: n. 备办食物者；承办酒席的人；筹备人

sentences.en: Caterer: Sure, you can. A table of four, too?
sentences.cn: 酒店招待：当然可以啦。还是四人一桌？

sentences.en: Krayeski called Jack Jacobs, a caterer who lives in Delray Beach.
sentences.cn: 约翰•柯耶斯基打电话给住在德尔雷海滩的酒席承办商杰克·雅各布斯。

sentences.en: Jane asked the caterer for a menu along the lines of the Morgans' wedding reception.
sentences.cn: 简向宴会组织者要了一份和摩根夫妇的婚礼宴会差不多的菜谱。
